title: Steam’s having a big Fallout sale right now.
text:

Published By: Kotaku.com - Today 
Steam’s having a big Fallout sale right now. Fallout 3 GOTY edition for 50% off, New Vegas Ultimate Edition for 50% off, and more. With Fa...
